articles.title: Russia-Ukraine Crisis: Conflict hits sunflower oil imports; industry weighs options in other countries
articles.description: India imports 25 lakh tonne of sunflower oil annually, of which 70 per cent comes from Ukraine, 20 per cent from Russia and 10 per cent from Argentina
articles.content:

articles.title: Argentina scientists unearth dinosaur with ‘puny arms’ and hard head
articles.description: Dinosaur probably belongs to carnivorous group called abelisaurs and may have used its head to ram its prey
articles.content:
Scientists in Argentina have unearthed the remains of a previously unknown species of meat-eating dinosaur that lived about 70m years ago that had puny arms and may have used its powerful head to ram its prey.

articles.title: Fossil of dinosaur with hard head and tiny arms found in Argentina
articles.description: "Some scientists think that could mean the animal hunted its prey by charging them with its head," Agnolin added. The discovery adds to Argentina's reputation as a treasure trove of fossils of dinosaurs and other prehistoric creatures.

articles.title: Fossil of dinosaur with hard head and tiny arms found in Argentina
articles.description: Scientists have unearthed in Argentina the remains of a previously unknown species of meat-eating dinosaur that lived about 70 million years ago that had puny arms and may have used its powerful head to ram its prey. The fossil skull of the Cretaceous Period dinosaur, named Guemesia ochoai, was discovered in Argentina's northwestern Salta province.

articles.title: ‘Entre Nosotros’ Tops Billboard Argentina Hot 100 Chart for 14th Week
articles.description: Tiago PZK, LIT Killah, Nicki Nicole and Maria Becerra’s “Entre Nosotros” is No. 1 on the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 chart (dated Feb. 19).
articles.content: Tiago PZK, LIT Killah, Nicki Nicole and Maria Becerra’s “Entre Nosotros” spends a 14th week at No. 1 on the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 chart (dated Feb. 19), the second longest command since the chart’s inception in 2018, surpassing “Otro Trago” by ... [2172 chars]

articles.title: Argentina soy harvest in central zone could be lowest in 14 years -exchange

articles.title: Some Latin American countries call for Russian withdrawal of Ukraine
articles.description: Colombia, Argentina, Chile and Ecuador condemned Russia's invasion of Ukraine and Brazil will support a U.N. resolution against Russia, while Cuba blamed the U.S.
articles.content:
Colombia, Argentina and Chile on Thursday called for swift withdrawal of Russian troops from Ukraine, as other Latin American countries rejected the use of force but stopped short of calling for a Russian exit.

articles.content:
SANTIAGO, Chile (AP) — Second-seeded Albert Ramos-Viñolas of Spain advanced on Friday to the semifinals of the Chile Open after beating Argentina’s Facundo Bagnis 7-5, 6-2 to reach the final four of the clay-court tournament.

articles.title: World Bank approves US$295m loans for Argentina's strategic ecosystem management
articles.description: This financing supports the new Employment Promotion Program, created by the national government in November 2021 to benefit some 600,000 people seeking to enter the labor market, with a focus on women.
articles.content:
The World Bank Board of Directors today approved two loans totaling US$295 million to foster the labor market inclusion of vulnerable groups and to support the sustainable management of the country's strategic ecosystems.
